title: Pic

see-also.note: Street and Smith's All Star Sports

additional-notes: The magazine begun by Street and Smith in 1937 appears to have been transferred to Wagner Publications in 1950, though the issue numbering at the transition is slightly inconsistent.  Wagner continued Pic into the 1960s.

In 1949, issues were published quarterly with distinct titles.  The Spring 1949 issue (v. 21 no. 1) was titled 'Pic Quarterly Baseball Pictorial'.  The Summer 1949 issue (v. 21 no. 2) was 'Pic Quarterly Racing Pictorial'.  Fall 1949 (v. 21 no. 3) brought the Football Pictorial issue, and Winter 1949-1950 (v. 21 no. 4) was the Sports Review issue.  After Wagner took over the Pic title, Street and Smith continued to bring out sports issues under 'Street and Smith's All Star Sports' and various other titles for some years into the 1950s.
